resources.string: I am looking for opportunities in software engineering and data analytics roles. I am proficient in Python, Ruby, Java and have exposure to many tools and libraries like jupyter notebooks, numpy, pandas, matplotlib etc. In my free time I like to play soccer, ski, scuba dive and anything where Iâ€™m active, solving puzzles or making things.
Special thanks to Arvin Angue and Justin Chau

I am an electrical and biomedical engineering student who is passionate about advancing the health care field through applying engineering principles. Most of my work today is done burying my head in books or working on my final year capstone project as I approach graduation (April 2019). \n \n I strive under pressure (how else are diamond made?) and am always looking for the next opportunity to develop my skills with goals to one day pursue an academic, R&D, or entrepreneurial career!
